titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a five-year extension of the medicare-dependent, small, rural hospital payment provisions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6753)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/9/1994--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend for five years payments to small, rural hospitals under the Medicare Dependent Hospital Program.
